name: Heroes quest (Flautarian)
description:
Heroes quest is an isometrical game based of the mythical arcade game named 'Gauntlet', where you take the role of an adventurer that want to accomplish all the missions that this world can offer. Heroes quest ensure hours of challenges and fun, furthermore, the game offers:

-More than 40 levels to complete
-Lot of armor and items to equip the player.
-Special attacks depending of the hero type.
-A complete level designer to let the player to create his/her owns levels after pass the final island.

Heroes quest has the following control mapping:
-Character movement: W, A, S, D
-Basic attack: J
-Hero special attack: K
-Use equipped item: H
-Use health potion: Q
-Action: E
-Sprint: L
